name: Get Typeform leads info from Clearbit and add them to Airtable
description: Use your lead's email address from Typeform responses in Clearbit to get all their information and add them to Airtable to create a leads database. This template uses this [Airtable base template.](https://airtable.com/shrMELXdcjzHIwhGX/tbl00MDBBdj7zA47v/viwzExmnUqCLKw1ff?blocks=hide)
